items.name: Big Berry Energy 3.8% Five Berry Sour
items.desc:
ABV: 3.8%
Style: Five Berry Sour
Additions: Raspberry, Gooseberry, Blueberry, Lingonberry & Haskap (it’s a berry, we promise)
We’re bringing the BIG berry energy for this super sessionable sour. No fruit smoothie here- just bursting tart fruity vibes.
Give me ALL the berries.

items.name: Cast Iron Billy 10.5% Imperial Brown Stout
items.desc:
ABV: 10.5%
Style: Imperial Brown Stout
Cast Iron Billy is a luxurious Imperial Brown Stout that harkens back to Victorian London’s brewing golden age. We’re extremely proud of our city’s rich brewing history and so for this beer we’ve drawn on an original Barclay Perkins recipe from 1832.
Velvety smooth with chocolate, caramel and dark berry flavours alongside delicate hints of vanilla- you’d be forgiven for thinking Cast Iron Billy sits well below its 10.5% ABV.
Close your eyes, take a sip and imagine walking down the smog filled streets of industrial revolution era Southwark...
...or maybe just enjoy your beer.

items.name: Choice Of Dessert 10% Choco Banana Stout
items.desc:
ABV: 10%
Style: Choco-Banana Imperial Milk Stout
Additions: Banana Purée, Cacao Nibs, Lactose
(not suitable for vegans)
This beer is Luxury with a capital ‘L’
Choice Of Dessert is silky smooth, creamy and rich. Loaded with banana (not the foam kind) and cacao nibs for a seriously decadent stout- no artificial flavourings in sight!
Skip the cheese board.

items.name: Karate 7.4% NEIPA
items.desc:
ABV: 7.4%
Style: New England IPA
Hops: Idaho-7 & Citra
Juicy overripe mango & luscious pineapple notes with a touch of citrus that’s more satsuma than lemon/lime. Soft and full mouthfeel but light enough to keep you coming back for more.
This fruit basket has a black belt.

items.name: Lunar Park 7.2% NEIPA
items.desc:
ABV: 7.2%
Style: New England IPA
Hops: Simcoe & Amarillo
All I need to say about this beer is...
DREAM.
HOP.
COMBO.

items.name: Pale Fire 4.8% Pale Ale
items.desc:
ABV: 4.8%
Style: Pale Ale
Hops: Amarillo & Mosaic
Pale Fire.
We’ve come a long long way together.
If there is one beer that we think of when our minds drift to what Pressure Drop means, it is Pale Fire. Brewed every week since our earliest days, it is our shining, hazy gold, North Star of a beer.
Pale Fire is the definition of the Pressure Drop mantra - “We brew what we would like to drink”. Sessionable, with tropical aromas from the Mosaic and Amarillo hops, it is a juicy pale with a balanced bitter finish.
When we first began experimenting with canning here at Pressure Drop, the end goal was always going to be Pale Fire in cans. Spending time with pals, opening a six pack of fresh and crisp Pale Fire, enjoying its easy drinking ways. That has been the dream, now it is the reality.
Find your nearest sun drenched swimming pool, hike in the gentle shade of a pine forest, or, failing that, sit in the hazy summer heat of a city park. Crack open a can, and let the world become a better place.
SHIPPING £3.99 per box
Boxes hold up to 15 cans
Our minimum order is 12 cans (these can be a mix of different beers)

items.name: Something Described As Artisan 4.2%
items.desc:
ABV: 4.2%
Style: New England Pale Ale
Hops: HBC568
Collaboration with Indy Man Beer Con
Manchester we miss you!
This fruity lil number was brewed to celebrate the festival that wasn’t. This new experimental hop brings a fresh & tropical flavour with a touch of pine. It's a soft, floral and fruity easy going New England gem.
See ya next year IMBC!

items.name: Welcome To The Internet 8.5% DIPA
items.desc:
ABV: 8.5%
Style: New England Double IPA
Hops: Mosaic
Positivity is the way!
Mosaic is the future!
NE DIPA = BBF 4 LYF!
Doggos for president!
Welcome To The Internet!
Be nice, make friends, eat bread
